page.description: The definition of a bar point.

discussion.p: The bar point will draw a data point on the chart as an area. The bar creates a filled area representing the data point as the area on the "continuous" axis between the "base" and "value".
The "margin" defines the space between bars, with "major" being the distance between bars and the edge of the chart, and "minor" being the distance between bars.
The "label" settings applicable to the bar are "location" and "callout.from".

Values of "label.location" can be "none", "callout", "center", "before", "after", "start" and "end". The value "center" will place the label in the center of the bar area. The values "before" and "after" will draw the label outside the bar either to the top/left or bottom/right respectively. The value "start" will draw the label at the "base" and "end" will draw the label at the "value". The values of "before", "after", "start" and "end" can be used singularly or combined with a space. For example, on a horizontal linear chart a location of "after start" would place the label below the bar at the "base" value of the bar.
Values of "callout.from" can be "center", "before", "after", "start" and "end". All the "callout.from" values will behave the same as the "label.location".

property.name: major
property.description: The major margin defines the space between groups of bars.

property.name: minor
property.description: The minor margin defines the space between bars inside of a group.

property.name: line
property.description: The bar line definition. See *[link:A5.chart Definition Line Object]*.

property.name: fill
property.description: The bar fill definition. See *[link:A5.chart Definition Fill Object]*.

property.name: label
property.description: The bar label. See *[link:A5.chart Definition Label Object]*.

property.name: attrs
property.description: The attributes to add to the bar element. A function called with "data" (see *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*) and "temp" can be used to dynamically calculate the attributes.

property.name: tip
property.description: The mouseover tip to add to the bar element. A function called with "data" (see *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*) and "temp" can be used to dynamically calculate the tip.
